content: Lebron is the best player in the league, there’s no doubt about that. But he definitely does not deserve to win the MVP this year. He played 2 or 3 more minutes a game than all those guys, has two other all stars on his team, and for all that they have the 5th best record in the league. One more loss and they’re the 8th best record. The only argument for Lebron is how absolutely incompetent Kyrie is at running at offense, and his admittedly crazy counting stats which still aren’t as good as Harden’s or Westbrook’s, despite playing a significant amount of more minutes than them. And it’s not like you can argue in favor of Lebron’s defense this year, he somehow managed to put in less effort than Harden.
